targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_currentSOC_pct"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "totalRange_km"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY "time" DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "totalRange_km" AS "Total Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.batteryStatus.currentSOC_pct" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_currentSOC_pct" AS "Primary Engine SoC"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.batteryStatus.cruisingRangeElectric_km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "carCapturedTimestamp" AS "time",
  "primary_remainingRange_km" AS "Primary Engine Range"
FROM ranges
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("carCapturedTimestamp") AND
  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

  vehicle_vin = '$VIN'
ORDER BY 1

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.currentTotalRange_km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.currentConsumption_kwhp100km" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "0_userdata.0.vw-connect.0.$VIN.efficiency_pct" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.chargingStatus.chargePower_kW" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vw-connect.0.$VIN.status.chargingStatus.chargeRate_kmph" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
